titleInfo.title: Was committed to the State Depot

mods.abstract: WAS COMMITTED to the State Depot, on the 28th Nov., 1860, boy LEWIS, says he belongs to Tim Cockram, on Redwod, 10 miles from Port HudsonHe is dark copper color, 5 feet 8 1/2 inches high, 22 or 23 years old, has been cipped on the left side, small scar on the fore finger of the right handThe owner will please take him awayJJODOM, Keeper State Depotnov29,

detail.title: Daily gazette and comet(Baton Rouge, La.) 1856-186?

mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.

mods.note: Louisiana Runaway Slave Advertisements, 1836-1865, Louisiana Digital Library, Baton Rouge, La.
